page.title: 06HOME LIFE Menus
page.content: {Selection of Evening Meals.} MAIN COURSES. Beefburger,salad and peas. Mince pie,cabbage,carrots,mashed potatoes and gravy. Chicken,broccoli and creamed potatoes. Scrambled egg on toast. Scollops,egg and beans. Toasted sardine sandwiches. Eggs in onion sauce,sausage and fried potatoes. Fish and chips,peas and sweet corn. Pork steak,stuffing,mashed potatoes and brussels sprouts. Roast ham,salad,rice,tuna fish and new potatoes. Spaghetti on toast. PUDDINGS. Yoghurt. Fresh fruit. Cheese and biscuits. Ice-cream. Apple pie and cream. Ginger sponge. Semolina. Mousse.Stewed fruit.Trifle. Jelly.
